attributes.action: Introduce a regulation to force all service & petrol stations to sell LPG
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government support the use of LPG by offering a reduced tax on this efficient and environmently friendly fuel and yet less than one third of petrol stations across the UK sell LPG.  This makes a mockery of the governments attempts to encourage motorists to spend considerable sums of money to convert their vehicles to LPG which would halve their motoring costs and make a significant contribution to a greener environment.
